channel.title: Thunderbird check for new messages
channel.description: In Thunderbird's account settings the check boxes "Check for new messages when starting", "Check for new messages every ... minutes" and "Download new messages automatically" are deactivated. Is this a Whonix security setting or a bug?

item.title: Thunderbird check for new messages
item.dc:creator: thomasvatter
item.description:
In Thunderbird’s account settings the check boxes “Check for new messages when starting”, “Check for new messages every … minutes” and “Download new messages automatically” are deactivated. Is this a Whonix security setting or a bug?

Read full topic
